document_data.name: chapterhouse of the Radiant Heart
document_data.mainbody: This building was the chapter house for the [[Waterdhavian]] branch of the [[Most Noble Order of the Radiant Heart]].{{Cite web/Candlekeep forum/Questions for Ed Greenwood (2010)/Radiant Heart's Waterdeep Chapterhouse}}
document_data.Location: This building was located along the east side of [[Whaelgond Way]] in the [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]] of Waterdeep, about two doors down from the [[Jardeth Villa]].
document_data.Description: The chapterhouse was constructed of stone and stood three stories tall with a cellar below ground. The entrance to the building was a set of double door, overshadowed by a roofed porch that was supported by stout stone pillars.
